document.full_text: lawrence a. jacobs's resignation comes soon after the news of the world, a british tabloid and news corporation property, was forced to pay settlements in a phone hacking scandal.
document.title: general counsel of news corp. resigns in wake of settlement
lines_and_colors: lawrence a. jacobs's resignation comes soon after the news of the world, a british tabloid and news corporation property, was forced to pay settlements in a phone hacking scandal.
